There was recently a research paper with a proof of concept about how a mouse can effectively be turned into a Microphone. It works by capturing the raw movement data from high-performance gaming mice, which given enough DPI sensitivity and polling rate, can be used to calculate the sound vibrations and resulting audio. Although it sounds scary, you'll see that it does require specific conditions, so it's probably not something you need to worry about, but it's still interesting.
